page.title: 14SULTAN CADET CORPS,GOSPORT.
page.content: My name is Andrew Higham.I am eleven years old.Sultan{Cadets}are based in{Fort Grange}which is just off Military Road in Gosport.The fort was built about the middle of the 19th Century.On Monday nights we do sports :we can either go swimming,play tennis,play table tennis or play football.The instructors help us a lot to improve our skills.On Wednesdays we have to wear a uniform which is quite hard to put on.My uniform is mainly black.It has a black blazer,black trousers and a white T-shirt with a blue and white trim.Usually we practise drill or clean up the fort.In the winter we have to do exams to see if we can go to a higher class. I am very pleased that I am a cadet,perhaps I will join the Navy when I am older.
